name: Locust Swarm
description: A swarm of bugs that get into every nook and cranny of the battlefield. They're constant bugging just makes the conditions everyone is fighting in worse.
effect:
- Hazard Moves that deal damage now always deal 1 minimum. In addition, Hazards cannot be cleared while the weather is present.
- Offensive Support moves used by Bug-Types deal 1 damage.
- Bug-Type pokemon gain +1 Dexterity for the duration.
